Pulsating Heart.name: Pulsating Heart
Pulsating Heart.description: A heart that beats with a strange rhythm. A sense of safety is emmitted.

Pulsating Finger.name: Pulsating Finger
Pulsating Finger.description: A finger that twitching uncontrollably. It seems to point towards nearby treasures.

Rabbit's Foot.name: Rabbit's Foot
Rabbit's Foot.description: An old charm that brings good luck. It makes you feel lighter on your feet.
